channel.title: CVE Feed for ElementsKit -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ElementsKit -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-43996|2024-09-23T14:24:05.506Z -- elementskit -- elementskit%20pro
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in ElementsKit ElementsKit Pro allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects ElementsKit Pro: from n/a through 3.6.0.
